note: final_response_match_v2 threshold set to 0.5 to accommodate: 1) Calculated dates (YYYY-MM-DD format) being semantically equivalent to relative date phrases (e.g., 'next weekend', 'Saturday'), 2) Minor entity field variations (e.g., 'age': '3 years' vs 'age': '3 years old', 'species': 'dog' vs 'species': 'Dog'), 3) Partial matches when core fields (intent, confidence, should_execute) are correct. The evaluator should give partial credit when most fields match correctly.
